title: Luxury Penthouse For Sale With Remarkable Luscious Green Tranquil Area
details:
This luxury remarkable duplex penthouse with views of hill country from one side and Colombo city on the other side is available for immediate sale.

The property is located in Royal Park Condominium surrounding a green tranquil environment.

The house boasts a 5,000 sqft area of luxury living area which is hardly available in most of the condominium properties.

Key features of the penthouse:
• Duplex apartment with 5000 sqft lving area
• High floor
• 5 bedrooms with attached bathrooms
• Spacious living/dining area
• TV lounge
• Modern Italian pantry
• Large master bedroom with dressing area
• Tastefully furnished guest rooms
• Fully air-conditioned
• Fully furnished
• 4 Separate balconies
• Separate Maid’s room and bathroom
• 2 parking slots

You can also benefit from gym, swimming pool, kids play area, laundry, supermarket, salon, restaurant, tennis court, squash court and jogging track dedicated for Royal Park residents.
